metadata.title: CVE-2022-23518 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: rails-html-sanitizer is responsible for sanitizing HTML fragments in Railsapplications. Versions >= 1.0.3, < 1.4.4 are vulnerable to cross-sitescripting via data URIs when used in combination with Loofah >= 2.1.0. Thisissue is patched in version 1.4.4.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-html-sanitizer package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
